channel.title: Model problems

item.title: Model problems
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

Mellor:

-zipped it into a winrar archive( like all the models in my model file)

Most clients only read Gzip archives. You need to compress your mqo file using gzip

Read full topic

item.title: Model problems
item.dc:creator: @Mellor Mellor
item.description:
@Mellor wrote:

Oh I found the problem.

When i type add model 7000 , it says cannot find model 7000. But ive added the model into the models file, its in a winrar archive like all the others, not sure why it cant find it , any help?

Read full topic

item.title: Model problems
item.dc:creator: @Mellor Mellor
item.description:
@Mellor wrote:

Hey ,im hving problems getting my model into the game.
What ive done is

-made it into an mqo file, edited it in meta.
-made it into a dat file with datmaker.
-zipped it into a winrar archive( like all the models in my model file)
-put it into my models section of my client
-gone onto my client and type “add model 7000” which was what i named the file which i put into my client
-closed the client
-went into class8 and added -

if(i == 7000) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.anInt174 = 7000; //Model Drop/inv view class8.anInt181 = 919; class8.anInt190 = 429; class8.anInt198 = 1660; class8.anInt199 = -1; class8.anInt169 = 1; class8.anInt194 = 5; class8.anInt197 = 120; class8.anInt165 = 7000; //male wearing class8.anInt200 = 7000; //female wearing class8.anInt175 = 65; class8.aBoolean176 = false; class8.aString170 = "Scarf"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A scarf!".getBytes(); }

-saved, compiled.
-run client, logged in
-typed ::pickup 7000 1

The item’s name is working fine, “scarf”, and when i examine it, it says “A scarf!” , but the model is something different. Im not sure why. Its some pants, dont think that matters but im not sure why it isnt showing my model. Some help would be awesome, ta guys.

When I did the priorites bit on dat maker, i typed 10 in, and had it on No anim, but when i reopen the file, the 10 priority isnt there anymore, is that normal? Im not sure, this is my very first model. Thanks for the help guys.

Read full topic
